DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to obtain and compare bilateral elbow joint synovial fluid from patients with unilateral intraarticular elbow fracture and a contralateral healthy appearing elbow joint. The synovial fluid samples will undergo several forms of analysis for metabolites and proteins. Matched-pair statistical analysis will be performed to determine the metabolites and proteins that may play the greatest role in development of joint contracture.
DOC.brief_title: Synovial Fluid Analysis of Intraarticular Elbow Fracture
DOC.criteria: 18 years and older Intraarticular elbow fracture (humerus, radial head and/or ulna fracture) Age <18 years Open elbow fracture Bilateral elbow fractures Patients with history of osteomyelitis of elbow Inflammatory arthropathy (ie. Rheumatoid arthritis) Prior surgery on fractured elbow
